item.title: Things About Kafka
item.description: I work with Kafka a lot and this post is a summary of some interesting facts about it.

item.title: Emergence
item.description: Emergence is an interesting idea that complex behavior can emerge from group of very simple things that interact using a set of very simple rules. Emergence can be observed in lot of processes of nature. I present some of them here.

item.title: About
item.description: I am Shivaprasad Bhat. A Software Engineer (Since 2016) from India. ♥️ I love building interesting things. They may not always be useful or unique 😁. Checkout my GitHub. 👨‍💻 I am a polyglot programmer and can work in Go, Clojure & Python comfortably. 🤯 Neuroscience (and anything about the 🧠) is another strong interest of mine. Apart from tech & brain things, I also watch a lot of movies & play a lot of Arma 3 (King of the Hill mainly.
